body_html: Is this feature still under development? I think it would be very useful. The comment above suggests there are other ways of doing this. Could someone maybe post a tutorial of this? The only one I could find is from TensorFlow (https://github.com/tensorflow/models/blob/master/research/slim/README.md), but it only seems to be optimized for image classification models.

body: Is this feature still under development? I think it would be very useful. The comment above suggests there are other ways of doing this. Could someone maybe post a tutorial of this? The only one I could find is from TensorFlow (https://github.com/tensorflow/models/blob/master/research/slim/README.md), but it only seems to be optimized for image classification models.
